law.catch_line: Functions of Office for Agricultural Marketing and Product Promotion.

text.section: The functions of the office shall be supplementary to, and not in duplication of, the educational activities of the College of Agriculture of the University of Kentucky.
In accomplishing its purposes, the office shall not compete with business operated by private capital.
